title: Pixel Poro minigame - featuring Braum - out today!

replies.body: Rito, I expect an 8-bit game for every new champion now.

And now I'm imagining an 8-bit Riot team being made. Their sole purpose is to make a highly addictive League themed clone of popular 8-bit games. 

Tristana - Mario

Caitlyn - Duckhunt

Khazix - Metroid

Corki - F-zero

Renekton - Frogger 

Leona - Zelda

I can go on......

{{champion:119}} - Mario

{{champion:119}} - Duckhunt

{{champion:119}} - Metroid

{{champion:119}} - F-zero

{{champion:119}} - Frogger

{{champion:119}} - Zelda

I can go on......
{{champion:119}} It's-a-me.
i lol'd so hard
So much win here, that you may have just won the intertubez
Full Metal {{champion:126}} is more like master chief.... imagine a halo game based on league..... The dream.
What I would want is a smash bros. style game for league.
I just realized his weapon is like the gravity hammer and battle rifle in one......I think I just had a mind blown moment.
Rammus for sonic.

{{champion:133}} Pokemon

{{champion:115}} Bomberman

{{champion:83}} Pac-Man

{{champion:64}} Street Fighter

{{champion:69}} Snake

{{champion:31}} Rampage
{{champion:50}}  Flappy bird pls
go on...

People beat me to the punch on some of these

Ziggs - Bomberman

Lucian - Alien (undead) invaders

Vayne - Castlevania

Pulsefire Ez - Megaman

Why do people still do this...
So other people can downvote them

OMG I love the thresh one ... XD
{{champion:64}} Why do I keep losing
you can always blame your support
Blame{{champion:201}}? How dare you!
I second this opinion
omg nooooo poro abuse!
Leona was jealous of not being the only support with a shield.
{{champion:44}} :(
WAit, its not even a friggin shield its a door.
Thats used as a shield
Why can't he just use {{champion:17}} as a shield?
Bring back {{champion:31}} Eats the World rito pls
You can still play it at: http://chew-game.net
It takes sooo looong to load lol{{summoner:3}}
I have the game open just for the music on loop.
I outplayed myself on 2 players...
My favorite game is Punch-a-Poro {{champion:254}}
Thought it's Punch-a-{{champion:17}}
report {{champion:201}} for feeding 10 - 2 ... im so bad.
{{champion:89}} wont stop shining the sun in my eyes.
TIL I am surprisingly bad at pong
Braum gonna become the new teemo now that a game is released for him?{{champion:201}} ={{champion:17}} ?
Except much taller, arms wider than Teemo's body, a glorious mustache, and such a high amount of Manliness that Teemo can't even see it. Oh, and not universally hated.
not yet
Suddenly manly 5th Age Taric with strange sounds after getting three gems.  Taric rework is incoming. {{champion:44}}
Is it me or is the poro spawn was too op
So, I'm not good enough at pong to collect all of the winged devil poros while winning, or at all at any rate. Anyone better at pong want to say what happens? I'm very curious.
If you get 3 of the winged devil poros the next round you play will be against Armor of The Fifth Age Taric
I got frustrated at losing in 1-player mode. So I played 2p and left Leona standing still. Long story short, I lost... I feel so ashamed.
Rito y u do dis... Now I have to hurt a little poro :C
Flappy Bird {{champion:34}} .....
Who's going to play League of Legends when there's this...
